name: Poncho - Heal in Time (Global Game Jam 2022)
name_original: Poncho - Heal in Time (Global Game Jam 2022)
description:
"Poncho: heal in time" is a platformer game that uses the duality between 3D and 2D during gameplay to symbolize the connection between past and present and the importance of healing. Our protagonist Poncho wakes up after a long slumber, the world they knew is no more so they will have to travel between the two times to heal the world. Visiting the sanctuaries will provide the help they'll need to restore the world and heal the damage.

The game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022: Link to the game in GGJ
